entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow or rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
